name: First Run
description:
In the shadows you learn or you die

First Run! features three complete adventures that help novice gamemasters and players learn the rules of Shadowrun, Third Edition
IN THE SHADOWS YOU LEARN OR YOU DIE...
...while playing. From a basic gun battle to a run against a corporate research facility to smuggling, this product lets players and gamemasters encounter the unique elements of Shadowrun. First Run! offers gamemasters suggestions for overcoming the most difficult aspects of running a game, and provides guidelines for building ongoing campaigns. Each adventure also includes hint for increasing the difficulty to challenge experianced player. For use with Shadowrun, Third Edition.
